level.text: Any person aggrieved by the action of the Director granting, withholding, or revoking a Certificate of Occupancy may appeal the action to the Board of Zoning Adjustment, pursuant to D.C. Official Code 6-641.07(f) (2001), and the District of Columbia Zoning Regulations.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 5571, 5575 (December 17, 1982).
